actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that certain educational benefits paid by the Department of Defense to or on behalf of members of the Armed Forces shall be treated for purposes of taxation in the same manner as educational assistance payments under the GI bill.

summary.text: Exempts from taxation educational assistance payments made by the United States to or on behalf of members or former members of the armed forces or their dependents. Excludes lump-sum payments from such exemption.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that certain educational benefits paid by the Department of Defense to or on behalf of members of the Armed Forces shall be treated for purposes of taxation in the same manner as educational assistance payments under the GI bill.
